title: The Secret of Dunhaven Castle
description: A foreboding past, an uncertain future.For Cate Kensie, castle life is no fairy tale.With no family and a dead-end career, Cate Kensie and her beloved dog, Riley, trek across the pond to claim an unexpected inheritance: a Scottish castle! Soon after arriving, Cate begins to question her own sanity when she experiences strange events and peculiar manifestations. As Cate struggles to explain the unexplainable, she prowls the castleâ€™s vast and mysterious halls in search of answers. With a shroud of mystery enveloping her and Riley, will Cate discover the secret of Dunhaven Castle? And if she does, at what cost?
author: Nellie H. Steele
